attr.title: RagingBlasters
attr.desc: Raging Blasters is a vertical scroll shmup featuring high speed scrolling and the exhilaration of destruction.
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game from steam. Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to /ports/ragingblasters/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
Purchase and download the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1464550/RagingBlasters/ 

Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to /ports/ragingblasters/gamedata.
